title: Gutenberg's Bible?
content:
Hello,

I'm looking to find a typeface that is similar to the Textualis or Gothic Bookhand that is in Gutenberg's bible. I know it's a blackletter typeface but I want to find one that can replicate the unique font in the bible.
author: Kringdon5

comments.content:
Hi Peter,

you can order the metal [Bibelschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085842/http:/www.schriftenservice-d-stempel.de/rund-um/bibelschrift.htm) from D. Stempel. For digital versions, check out [FF Johannes G](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085842/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-johannes-g/) or [1456 Gutenberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085842/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/glc/1456-gutenberg/). I don’t know how good those are.  
F

Hello,

You might like to check this [post](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085842/http:/typophile.com/node/98161).
